channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Stranger Things S5 can wait: I'm grabbing these 3 Black Friday streaming deals instead – save big on Binge, Apple TV and Disney+
item.description: Black Friday deals are everywhere, but I think the hottest category is streaming. Right now you can get Apple TV, Binge and Disney+ for a monthly cost that's cheaper than Netflix's standard tier.

item.title: What is the release date for Landman season 2 episode 3 on Paramount+?
item.description: After Tommy and Cooper's emotional moment, I cannot wait for Landman season 2 episode 3. But when can we stream it?

item.title: Everything to know about Black Friday 2025: Sale dates and store hours, price matching, and more
item.description: Get up to speed on what time Black Friday sales start, worthwhile deals, price matching details, and tips on how to track price history.

item.title: Grab a stellar new tablet this Black Friday with these great Samsung Galaxy Tab deals
item.description: Samsung Galaxy Tab tablets are some of the best Android tablets around – and I’ve found some great Black Friday discounts

item.title: Its not Black Friday until we see these 23 classic deals — Yeti coolers, cordless drills, Samsonite luggage, Crest 3D Whitestrips
item.description: It just wouldn't be Black Friday without classic deals on LifeStraw, Crest Whitestrips, Samsonite luggage, Yeti coolers, and Coleman camping tents.
